greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = number of rooted signed trees with n nodes and k positive edges (0 <= k < n).
comment: Equivalently, the number of rooted trees with 2-colored non-root nodes, n nodes and k nodes of the first color.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1275 (first 50 rows)
program: R(n, y)={my(v=vector(n)); v[1]=1; for(k=1, n-1, my(p=(1+y)*v[k]); my(q=Vec(prod(j=0, poldegree(p, y), (1/(1-x*y^j) + O(x*x^(n\k)))^polcoeff(p, j)))); v=vector(n, j, v[j] + sum(i=1, (j-1)\k, v[j-i*k] * q[i+1]))); v; }
EulerMT(u)={my(n=#u, p=x*Ser(u), vars=variables(p)); Vec(exp( sum(i=1, n, substvec(p + O(x*x^(n\i)), vars, apply(v->v^i,vars))/i ))-1)}
results.author: _Andrew Howroyd_, May 13 2018
